content.raw:
Agreed.  I'm not quite sure when this was adjusted but I'm glad you made this issue to inform everyone (including myself) it was adjusted.  I'll modify the wiki right now to track this change.

Edit:  I ended up adding the following to the SubT API Wiki page.  Let me know if you think this is insufficient:  
"If any robot instance calls the `/subt/finish` service, the entire simulation instance will be terminated."
